titles.title: Recognizing September 2012 as the 160th anniversary of the arrival in the United States of Constantino Brumidi, the artist who painted the Apotheosis of Washington.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 11/16/2012--Introduced. Recognizes the 160th anniversary of the arrival in the United States of Constantino Brumidi, who painted the Apotheosis of Washington.
